headline: Lululemon (LULU): A Fresh Look at Valuation Following Recent Share Price Movements
summary: Lululemon athletica (LULU) shares have shown a mild 2% increase in the past day, but remain down over the past month and year. Recent price swings have many investors reassessing the brand’s growth outlook in today’s shifting market. See our latest analysis for lululemon athletica. Lululemon athletica’s shares have struggled to find their footing this year, with momentum fading as risk sentiment around big-brand growth stories shifts.
